channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Microsoft blogs

item.title: Accelerated Collaboration Forums: Join the Conversation and Drive Innovation!
item.description: Are you passionate about Microsoft security, compliance, and collaboration? Do you want to connect directly with product engineering teams and peers to shape the future of Microsoft solutions? If so, Accelerated Collaboration Forums (ACFs) are designed for you! What Are Accelerated Collaboration Forums (ACFs)? Accelerated Collaboration Forums (ACFs) are topic-specific discussion groups within the Microsoft Customer Connection Program (MCCP). They streamline how community members engage with Microsoft product teams and each other by organizing recurring calls focused on key topics. Instead of j...
